hero.title: Developer Building Backend Infrastructure for Centralized Web Systems

hero.skillsIntro: I have mastered the following technologies and skills

pythonBackend.title: Python Backend
pythonBackend.description: Architecting high-performance APIs and microservices using Django REST, FastAPI, and Flask. Focusing on scalability and efficient data processing.

devopsCloud.title: DevOps & Cloud
devopsCloud.description: Implementing CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure management for reliable system operation.

iotEngineering.title: IoT Engineering
iotEngineering.description: Designing IoT solutions and systems for connected devices, enabling real-time data collection and device management.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.description: Teaching and guiding developers, sharing best practices, and helping to develop technical skills in software engineering.

companies.title: Companies & Teams

about.title: About Me

about.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in Python Backend and DevOps. My journey started with a curiosity for programming and has evolved into building scalable systems and teaching others.
